___version.description: The version of the SAS-SAS protocol used for generating this file.

___url.description: The retrieval URL at which the peer can retrieve the activity dump file.

___size.description: The size of the activity dump file in bytes.

___checksum.description: The SHA-1 checksum of the contents of the activity dump file referred to by url.

___recordType.description: The type of records contained in the activity dump file.
